page.title: 02Mr.Watson and the E.E.C.
page.content: Mr.Watson is a farmer on Newlands Farm.He is past president of the N.F.U.and is now the regional member of the Milk Marketing Board.He knows a lot about modern farming and he told us his part in this industry. He explained the agricultural policy of the E.E.C. Until 10 years ago the goverment fixed the prices of most farm commodites but now the E.E.C. guarantees a basic price for most things.He is a dairy farmer so he sells to the Milk Marketing Board. If the milk is not sold then the E.E.C. stores it in Europe but he still gets a guaranteed payment.He said that to stop producing too much milk,farmers had to base their milk production on 1983 figures.This is called the quota system.The farmers have reduced herds or milk,Mr.Watson has used both methods.
